roleset.name: flat, uniformly horizontal

roles.note: Arg2 from the verb omitted, as it is unlikely.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Eygpt , probably because they 're comparitively level and calm . -LRB- I said comparatively -RRB- .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, flat-j.01, level-v.01, which corresponds to VNcls other_cos-45.5.
